title: Hottest Female League Champ (Poll)
body: Alrghty I know all of the guy League players have wondered this so now it's time for the community to vote, so here are the top 10 and the winner will officially be the hottest female League champ (Sorry but I had Annie removed so i don't seem like a pedofile) and this is only the first of a few polls.

replies.body: {{champion:421}}
Rek'Sai was excluded from the poll because it would not have been a fair competition otherwise.

{{champion:6}} C'mon Bard, we're too good for them.

{{champion:432}} No competition here.

{{champion:83}} Yeah they look like zombies!

{{champion:44}} This is truly, truly outrageous.

{{champion:63}} I'm too hot for them!

{{champion:57}} ROCK SOLID!!!!!

Perhaps I'm in the minority, but personally I believe {{champion:37}} should be up there.
I do believe I completely forget her in all of my polls, wow. Now if you'll excuse me i'm going to see what bleach taste like.
PLEASE NOOOOOOOOO! Seriously though I honestly feel like Sona's the hottest imo. I'm not a huge fan of the blue hair, but she's pretty damn hot.
You forgot to add {{champion:79}}  on that list.

Sometimes there's more to women than boots and ass.

Sometimes, they got style. {{champion:89}}
